carouselItems.name: Laurent Charpentier
carouselItems.quote: “Checkbook seamlessly enables our clients to send Digital Cheques with the
carouselItems.altquote: . Their APIs are easy to work with, and the Digital Cheque product is a great alternative to paper cheques.”

heroText.bannerContent: With Checkbook’s ACH direct deposit option, you can send funds directly to your recipient’s bank account - zero friction for your recipients. Simply provide the routing and account number of the destination account, and we'll take care of the rest.

horizhover.title: Programmable ACH Payments
horizhover.content: With Checkbook’s ACH direct deposit option, you can send funds directly to your recipient’s bank account - zero friction for your recipients. Simply provide the routing and account number of the destination account, and we'll take care of the rest.
horizhover.content1: Disburse payments to your users using our ACH API or full featured, user-friendly dashboard
horizhover.content2: Checkbook offers a secure, scalable and reliable way for your business to move money via ACH.

sectionThree.digitalcontent: Our Digital Check solution makes payments quick and easy. All you need is the recipient's name, email, and the amount - that's it! Recipients receive their Digital Check via email, where they can verify their bank account instantly for deposit.
sectionThree.content1: No more storing sensitive banking information. We take care of the compliance so you don't have to.
sectionThree.content2: No more storing sensitive banking information. We take care of the compliance so you don't have to.

discover.content1: FinTech Funding and Valuation versus Demand and Supply
discover.content3: How The Money Flows: Payments for Cash Advance

rgs.readycontent: Explore Checkbook, or create an account instantly and start sending payments. You can also contact us to design a custom package for your business.

rgstwo.readycontenttwo: Integrated per-transaction pricing with no hidden fees.

rgsthree.readycontentthree: Get up and running with Checkbook in as little as 10 minutes.

answers.question: How do I verify my bank?
answers.answer: Banks can either be verified instantly (using online banking username and password) or manually (using account and routing number) on Checkbook. If you are adding a bank for the first time on Checkbook, you will be prompted to complete your profile thorough a banner notification...
